item.title: Missing lit bollards with no lights, 22nd February
item.description:
The 2 lit bollards on the crossing island aren't fixed to the ground. The lights don't work. One bollard is in the golf club and the other one keeps moving around, especially in windy weather.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upton Road, Blendon, Greater London

item.title: Significant sized pothole - recent development, 22nd February
item.description:
This is large and deep enough to seriously hurt a cyclist and cause issues for motor vehicles and their suspension. I’ve been away for 2 weeks and this wasn’t present before. Especially dangerous if rain water fills it and a cyclist isn’t aware of it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Victoria Way, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sidewalks are covered with waste everywhere. Abandoned cars everywhere., 22nd February
item.description:
We moved into this new beautiful building that was just finalized a couple months ago. We moved to this area expecting things would be different , but not this different. There is garbage everywhere, next to the railway track, the garbage keeps pilling up, there are broken down cars everywhere, making almost impossible to walk. we're expecting a baby and we are already thinking about moving out of this area as it is not good to raise a child. Please help.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rollins Street, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
